title: Hydrological Model - LagMethod
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of the lag entity, which describes the lag routing method that represents the translation of the flood waves. It is associated with the reach entity.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be LagMethod

initialType.description: A text that describes the initial conditions. Values restricted to [Discharge=Inflow] and [Specified Discharge]

lag.discription: A number specifying the lag time. Units: Hours. (required). Units: min

initialDischarge.description: A number specifying the initial discharge. Units: m3/s or cfs depending on the metric system. Initial Discharge values need to be specified only when [Specified Discharge] in selected as the InitialType. Units: m3/s
